scenes.description: Hajime Todoroki performs her solo song 'BANDAGE'.
ReGLOSS members perform their group song 'bvdiz'.
The members of ReGLOSS talk about their performances during the MC section.

subtitles.original: ほっぺをくすぐっちまうかさぶたに
subtitles.english: Tickling scabs on my cheeks,

subtitles.original: いつかは剥がれ落ちて
subtitles.english: They'll eventually peel off.

subtitles.original: そりゃそう　そりゃそう
subtitles.english: That's right, that's right.

subtitles.original: 選んだのさ　自分次第でしょう
subtitles.english: You chose it, so it's up to you, right?

subtitles.original: 決める覚悟　迷いは捨て
subtitles.english: Prepared to decide, casting away hesitation,

subtitles.original: 風を食らう　辿る道
subtitles.english: Facing the wind, on the path I walk.

subtitles.original: 駆け引きなんていらないぜ
subtitles.english: No need for bargaining or tactics.

subtitles.original: What you wanna say?
subtitles.english: What you wanna say?

subtitles.original: 優越なマンデー　気分はブルー
subtitles.english: Superior Monday, feeling blue,

subtitles.original: 痛みを噛んで　削ぎ落とす
subtitles.english: Chewing on the pain, scraping it away.

subtitles.original: 古びたバンドエイドいらない　Do what you wanna do
subtitles.english: Don't need an old bandage, do what you wanna do.

subtitles.original: イエーイ！次の曲は「bvdiz」です！
subtitles.english: Yay! Our next song is 'bvdiz'!

subtitles.original: イエーイ！みんな！盛り上がってるかーい！
subtitles.english: Yay! Everyone! Are you pumped up?!

subtitles.original: サンキュー！ぜひ！大きな手拍子を！
subtitles.english: Thank you! Please! Give us a big round of applause!

subtitles.original: タップもたくさん使ってください！行くぞー！
subtitles.english: Use lots of taps too! Here we go!

subtitles.original: ドキドキ　最高　Everybody
subtitles.english: Thumping hearts, the best, everybody!

subtitles.original: Easy Breezy　歌い出せばFavorite
subtitles.english: Easy breezy, once you start singing, it's a favorite!

subtitles.original: ドキドキ　このままでいたいよね
subtitles.english: Thumping hearts, want to stay like this.

subtitles.original: Easy Breezy　踊ろうよEverybody
subtitles.english: Easy breezy, let's dance, everybody!

subtitles.original: それそれ重なったガチ
subtitles.english: Hey hey, stacked up for real,

subtitles.original: マイナスのプラスになり
subtitles.english: Turning minus into plus.

subtitles.original: 笑えればフリーダムだって価値観
subtitles.english: Values that say if you can laugh, you're free.

subtitles.original: ドキマギの一発から始まる
subtitles.english: Starting from a single flustered moment.

subtitles.original: 愉快な仲間　景色はバイマイサイド
subtitles.english: Funny friends, scenery by my side.

subtitles.original: もっと放ちたい　ときにバカ騒ぎ
subtitles.english: Want to let loose more, fooling around sometimes.

subtitles.original: 運命共同体
subtitles.english: Sharing a common destiny,

subtitles.original: 伝染してゆく愛なら
subtitles.english: If it's love that spreads...

subtitles.original: 分かち合えるエンパシー　共に目指すわ
subtitles.english: Empathy we can share, let's aim together...

subtitles.original: 虹の向こうへ
subtitles.english: Beyond the rainbow!

subtitles.original: 絶対絶対絶対絶対的キラチュン
subtitles.english: A definitely, definitely, definitely killer tune!

subtitles.original: 今は自由気まま水色つのユニバース
subtitles.english: Now free-spirited, a light-blue horned universe.

subtitles.original: Reload Reload Reload 進化するシナプス
subtitles.english: Reload, reload, reload, evolving synapses.

subtitles.original: 限界突破　引き付けるミラコ
subtitles.english: Breaking limits, drawing in miracles.

subtitles.original: わあ皆さん！手拍子叩いてくれてありがとうね！
subtitles.english: Wow, everyone! Thank you for clapping along!

subtitles.original: 次は、みんなで一緒にワイパーをしていくよ！
subtitles.english: Next, let's all do the windshield wiper motion together!

subtitles.original: ドキドキ　最高　Everybody
subtitles.english: Thumping hearts, the best, everybody!

subtitles.original: Easy Breezy　歌い出せばFavorite
subtitles.english: Easy breezy, once you start singing, it's a favorite!

subtitles.original: ドキドキ　このままでいたいよね
subtitles.english: Thumping hearts, want to stay like this.

subtitles.original: Easy Breezy　踊ろうよEverybody
subtitles.english: Easy breezy, let's dance, everybody!

subtitles.original: 一人募ればまた一人も一緒に会いたくなる気持ち
subtitles.english: The feeling of missing someone more as more people gather.

subtitles.original: 片隅のモノローグも繋がるプロローグ
subtitles.english: A monologue in the corner connects to a prologue.

subtitles.original: 知る日があった夢のストーリー　みんなといる空間がエクスタシー
subtitles.english: A dream story from a day I remember, ecstasy being with you all.

subtitles.original: 共感するかけがえないメモリー　一緒に無我夢中に掴みとるネクストステージ
subtitles.english: Invaluable memories we share, grabbing the next stage together frantically.

subtitles.original: 運命共同体
subtitles.english: Sharing a common destiny,

subtitles.original: 伝染してゆく愛なら
subtitles.english: If it's love that spreads...

subtitles.original: 分かち合えるエンパシー　共に目指すわ
subtitles.english: Empathy we can share, let's aim together...

subtitles.original: 虹の向こうへ
subtitles.english: Beyond the rainbow!

subtitles.original: 絶対絶対絶対絶対的キラチュン
subtitles.english: A definitely, definitely, definitely killer tune!

subtitles.original: 今は自由気まま水色つのユニバース
subtitles.english: Now free-spirited, a light-blue horned universe.

subtitles.original: Reload Reload Reload 進化するシナプス
subtitles.english: Reload, reload, reload, evolving synapses.

subtitles.original: 限界突破　引き付けるミラコ
subtitles.english: Breaking limits, drawing in miracles.

subtitles.original: ドキドキ　最高　Everybody
subtitles.english: Thumping hearts, the best, everybody!

subtitles.original: Easy Breezy　歌い出せばFavorite
subtitles.english: Easy breezy, once you start singing, it's a favorite!

subtitles.original: ドキドキ　このままでいたいよね
subtitles.english: Thumping hearts, want to stay like this.

subtitles.original: Easy Breezy　踊ろうよEverybody
subtitles.english: Easy breezy, let's dance, everybody!

subtitles.original: イエーイ！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: いい感じだったね！
subtitles.english: That felt good!

subtitles.original: やっちゃった！
subtitles.english: We did it!

subtitles.original: 一気に行きおわったね。ソロパートからね、
subtitles.english: We finished them all in one go. From the solo parts,

subtitles.original: 2人の曲、それからbvdizもありましたが、
subtitles.english: to the duet, and then bvdiz...

subtitles.original: 奏のアカペラ痺れたよー！
subtitles.english: Kanade's a cappella gave me chills!

subtitles.original: やばいー！本当によかった！
subtitles.english: Oh man! It was so good!

subtitles.original: 泣きそう...
subtitles.english: I'm gonna cry...

subtitles.original: めちゃめちゃよかったよ！
subtitles.english: It was absolutely wonderful!

subtitles.original: 泣きました。
subtitles.english: I cried.

subtitles.original: 頑張ったー。
subtitles.english: I did my best.

subtitles.original: 最高だったよ！
subtitles.english: It was the best!

subtitles.original: 嬉しいです...
subtitles.english: I'm so happy...

subtitles.original: 動きがうるさい。
subtitles.english: You're moving too much.

subtitles.original: ごめんなさーい。
subtitles.english: Sorry!

subtitles.original: そんなこと言う番長もさ、めちゃくちゃダンスかっこよかったじゃんね！
subtitles.english: But you, Bancho, your dance was super cool too!

subtitles.original: すごかった！
subtitles.english: It was amazing!

subtitles.original: さすがのダンス柱！
subtitles.english: As expected of the pillar of dance!

subtitles.original: ありがとねー！
subtitles.english: Thanks!

subtitles.original: ダンス番長。
subtitles.english: Dance Bancho.

subtitles.original: レベルがちげえぞ！
subtitles.english: The level is different!

subtitles.original: 俺めっちゃ好き。
subtitles.english: I really like it.

subtitles.original: 腰で？あ！これ好き！これ！
subtitles.english: The hips? Ah! I like this! This!

subtitles.original: ほら。
subtitles.english: See.

subtitles.original: 私もここ、ここ好き！なんかこういうやつ。
subtitles.english: I like this part, this part too! Like this kind of thing.

subtitles.original: それ違う番長... ブブブブ。
subtitles.english: That's a different Bancho... Vroom vroom.

subtitles.original: あ、これこれ。違いました。
subtitles.english: Ah, this, this. My bad.

subtitles.original: ありがとうー！
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: で、みんなでね、bvdizも歌って。
subtitles.english: And then we all sang bvdiz together.

subtitles.original: 楽しかったにゃー、みんなで。
subtitles.english: It was so fun, everyone!

subtitles.original: 最高！
subtitles.english: Awesome!

subtitles.original: なんか、楽しめる曲だったよね、めっちゃ。
subtitles.english: It was a really enjoyable song.

subtitles.original: そうだね。
subtitles.english: True.

subtitles.original: すごいもう、コメント欄もみんなすごい！
subtitles.english: Wow, the comment section is going crazy too!

subtitles.original: 「奏」とか「番長」とか「梨花」とか「青くん」とか「らでん」とか、みんな！
subtitles.english: Kanade, Bancho, Ririka, Ao-kun, Raden... Everyone!
